column2: title=The Children of Húrin: Deluxe Edition
author=[[J.R.R. Tolkien]], edited by [[Christopher Tolkien]], illustrated by [[Alan Lee]]

column1: '''''The Children of Húrin: Deluxe Edition''''' is the special edition of [[The Children of Húrin]] which was released at the same time. It is the same as the regular edition with the exception that it is bound in higher quality material and comes in a slipcase with a gold foil stamp.
[[HarperCollins]] printed 10,000 copies of the deluxe edition.
[[Christopher Tolkien]] signed approximately 900 adhesive book plates which have been glued to some copies of this deluxe edition.
